text:
Parsley Health | Lead Engineer | NYC | Full Time | On-Site

Parsley Health offers high-tech holistic alternatives to 'big medicine,' with advanced testing, personalized care, and natural options. We launched in NYC and after closing our first round of funding are expanding to LA and SF this fall.

We are hiring an engineering lead to build the digital platform to scale our unique approach to healthcare. The platform will connect the patient and practitioner across all platforms, boosting patient satisfaction, LTV and health outcomes.

Our ideal candidate will be a doer and a leader, having built delightful consumer facing products, highly efficient administrative views and powerful data platforms. Experience with high security / HIPAA environments a plus. Stack TBD, but let's say Node + React + HIPPA AWS

More here: https://parsleyhealth.com/careers/#panel2d
